item.description:
• FRIDAY JUNE 8TH, 2012
    9PM - 2AM, 21+
    DJ SUSAN ESTHERA
    Caprice Lounge
    275 Temont Street, Boston
    (Short Walk from Boston Common)

    Just a short stroll down Tremont Street from the Boston Common, Dyke Night brings you the ANNUAL Dyke March After-Party.  With one of the most sought after female-DJs Susan Esthera (Club Café, Machine, Toast, Milky Way).

    Caprice has an ultra lounge-y feel so it’s a great place to relax on a sofa catching up with old friends or head upstairs to two additional rooms and dance the night away with your new pride crush.  Caprice is located in the heart of the Theatre District across from the Wang Center.

    Just a short walk from the Boston Common, this event is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March so show your support!

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Official Dyke March After-Party
